PAGE.h3: What is fs/jffs3 in the MTD CVS repository?
PAGE.p:
This is currently almost the same as JFFS2 + Ferenc Havasi's "summary" patch applied. The patch is available seperately here
Some other minor improvements have been committed.
PAGE.h3: How can I participate in JFFS3 development?
PAGE.p: You are invited to discuss JFFS3 design issues on the mailing list. You can also join us on IRC
